A frontend application that fetches all poll data dynamically from backend APIs
A backend API service that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Database schema to store polls, voting options, and vote counts
User interface to browse available polls and their voting options
Functionality for users to cast votes for specific poll options
Real-time display of voting results after a user submits their vote
Persistent storage and retrieval of vote data in the database
Page layout with white background and navy-styled components as per design instructions
Navigation between poll browsing, voting, and results viewing sections
Error handling for invalid poll selections or submission issues
Loading states during data fetching from backend APIs
Responsive UI compatible across desktop and mobile devices
Package.json configured with `install:all` script to install both frontend and backend dependencies
Package.json configured with `dev` script to start both frontend and backend concurrently
Security measures to prevent duplicate votes from the same user or session
